name: Patric! Stay home!
description:
Help Patric stay home! 

Keep 5 stats full (click on objects to interact), don't  let Patric go out or touch SARS-CoV molecules. Try to keep him home and healthy as much as possible.  

Stay home! Stay safe! Good luck!

Controls:

Left Mouse Click: move, destroy moleculas

Hold pressed Left Mouse Click: use objects
